TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that blocks DNA synthesis and may prevent tumor growth. It is being studied as a treatment for cancer.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "glycinamide ribonucleotide formyltransferase inhibitor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "inhibidor de glicinamida ribonucleótida formiltransferasa"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que bloquea la síntesis del ADN y que puede prevenir el crecimiento de tumores. Se encuentra en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer.
